name: ProcessInfo
desc: A collection of information about the current process.

items.name: processInfo
items.desc: Returns the process information agent for the process.

items.name: arguments
items.desc: Array of strings with the command-line arguments for the process.

items.name: environment
items.desc: The variable names (keys) and their values in the environment from which the process was launched.

items.name: globallyUniqueString
items.desc: Global unique identifier for the process.

items.name: isMacCatalystApp
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the process is a Mac app built with Mac Catalyst.

items.name: processIdentifier
items.desc: The identifier of the process (often called process ID).

items.name: processName
items.desc: The name of the process.

items.name: userName
items.desc: Returns the account name of the current user.

items.name: fullUserName
items.desc: Returns the full name of the current user.

items.name: disableSuddenTermination
items.desc: Disables the application for quickly killing using sudden termination.

items.name: enableSuddenTermination
items.desc: Enables the application for quick killing using sudden termination.

items.name: disableAutomaticTermination
items.desc: Disables automatic termination for the application.

items.name: enableAutomaticTermination
items.desc: Enables automatic termination for the application.

items.name: automaticTerminationSupportEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the app supports automatic termination.

items.name: hostName
items.desc: The name of the host computer on which the process is executing.

items.name: operatingSystem
items.desc: Returns a constant to indicate the operating system on which the process is executing.

items.name: operatingSystemName
items.desc: Returns a string containing the name of the operating system on which the process is executing.

items.name: operatingSystemVersionString
items.desc: A string containing the version of the operating system on which the process is executing.

items.name: operatingSystemVersion
items.desc: The version of the operating system on which the process is executing.

items.name: isOperatingSystemAtLeast
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the version of the operating system on which the process is executing is the same or later than the given version.

items.name: processorCount
items.desc: The number of processing cores available on the computer.

items.name: activeProcessorCount
items.desc: The number of active processing cores available on the computer.

items.name: physicalMemory
items.desc: The amount of physical memory on the computer in bytes.

items.name: systemUptime
items.desc: The amount of time the system has been awake since the last time it was restarted.

items.name: beginActivity
items.desc: Begin an activity using the given options and reason.

items.name: endActivity
items.desc: Ends the given activity.

items.name: thermalState
items.desc: The current thermal state of the system.

items.name: isLowPowerModeEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether Low Power Mode is enabled on an iOS device.

items.name: ProcessInfo.ThermalState
items.desc: Values used to indicate the systemâ€™s thermal state.

items.name: thermalStateDidChangeNotification
items.desc: Posted when the thermal state of the system changes.

items.name: NSProcessInfoPowerStateDidChange
items.desc: Posted when the power state (Low Power Mode is enabled or disabled) of an iOS device changes.
